title: Consent Record Created
description: Fired when a new consent record is created for a user.

consentId.description: Unique identifier for the consent record.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user associated with the consent record.

purposes.description: Map of purpose names to consent status.

regulation.description: The privacy regulation under which the consent was recorded.

source.description: The source through which the consent was collected.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the user at the time of consent.

userAgent.description: The user agent string of the browser or client at the time of consent.
